title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to New York Times Best selling author Jeff Pearlman about his new book on Bo Jackson. And Marcelllus Wiley joins us for his weekly appearance, to discuss his new episode of "More To it.. with Marcellus Wiley" where he spoke to Bills Hall of Famer Bruce Smith.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to New York Times Best selling author Jeff Pearlman about his new book on Bo Jackson. And Marcelllus Wiley joins us for his weekly appearance, to discuss his new episode of "More To it.. with Marcellus Wiley" where he spoke to Bills Hall of Famer Bruce Smith.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
